string-array.name: words
string-array.item: JAYA BACHCHAN~Shehenshah is one of the most iconic movies of Bollywood history. Who wrote the original story of Shehenshah?
IZZAT~The only bollywood movie to feature Jayalalitha
SRIDEVI~A famous actress played the role of Rajnikanth\'s mother in a tamil movie. Her age was only 13 years at that time. Who was she?
HEROINE~Kareena Kapoor wore over 130 dresses provided from top designers from all over the world in which film?
READY STEADY PO~What was \'Chennai Express\' earlier called?
BROTHERS~First ever collaboration of Akshay Kumar - Karan Johar. What is the movie name?
KAREENA KAPOOR~In an interview in 2009, she said that she does 60 to 100 Suryanamaskars in yoga every day. Which actress is she?
HEMA MALINI~Highest-paid actress in 1976 to 1980
AMITABH BACHCHAN~This acting legend worked in Calcutta for a shipping firm. His first salary was Rs. 500. Who is he?
BAAHUBALI~This movie entered Guinness Book for World\'s Biggest Poster. Name the movie.
SHREYA GHOSHAL~This female singer started learning music at the age of four.
KAMAL HAASAN~He became the first Indian actor to get Rs 1 crore as his remuneration for a single film in 1994.
HEMA MALINI~This actress made her bollywood debut opposite Raj Kapoor.
HEMA MALINI~Politician, Bahratnatyam dancer, mother of two, movie actress, director and producer
SWADES~First Indian film shot inside the NASA research center.
MUNNABHAI MBBS~Shah Rukh Khan was the first choice for lead role in this movie but Sanjay Dutt finally won it. Name the movie.
YAADEIN~This movie released in 1964, features Sunil Dutt, as the only actor in this 113 minutes movie.
YAADEIN~This movie entered Guinness Book of World Records in the category Fewest actors in a narrative film. It had only one actor.
MANTHAN~This movie by Shyam Benegal was technically produced by \'500000 farmers\' of Gujarat depicting White Revolution.
JAGDISH RAJ~He holds the holds a Guinness World Record record for being the most type-cast actor. He played a police inspector in 144 films.
RANG DE BASANTI~Rakeysh Mehra shot all the songs in this movie with none of the actors lip syncing in them.
FATIMA BEGUM~India\'s 1st female film director in 1926.
WAHEEDA REHMAN~She played both mother-role and lover-role to Amitabh Bachchan.
RAJNIKANTH~Many say that this actor always says ENNA RASCALA. But the truth is, he never said that dialogue in any movie. Who is he?
LAGAAN~This movie had the maximum number of British actors ever to be cast in a single movie in the history of Bollywood cinema.
MERA NAAM JOKER~The first Hindi movie to have not one but two intervals.
RISHI KAPOOR~20 new actresses, from Dimple Kapadia to Divya Bharti, made their debuts opposite this actor. Who is this actor?

DEVIKA RANI~First Actress with a degree in film making
